quote_first: Mark woke with a start and sat up, trying to focus his eyes on his watch. All he could see was the second hand moving:
quote_last: . Hell. He shot up from the chair, his stiff neck and back hurting him; he was still dressed.
title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: My watch lay on the dressing-table close by; glancing at it, I saw that the time was
quote_last: . I had been told that the family breakfasted at nine, so I had nearly two-and-a-half hours of leisure. Of course, I would go out, and enjoy the freshness of the morning.
title: Ravensdene Court
author: J.S. Fletcher
